title: Collingwood v Brisbane: AFL 2025 first preliminary final – live
summary: The Pies and Lions face off at the MCG, competing for a place in the grand final against the Cats. Martin Pegan provides live updates on the match. Fans are eagerly anticipating the outcome.

title: Merseyside derby buildup, Manchester United v Chelsea and more – matchday live
summary: Emillia Hawkins will provide news and analysis leading up to today's key football matches. Fans can expect insights on the games and teams involved. Stay tuned for updates on all the major action.

title: Poland scrambles aircraft as Russia attacks Ukraine with hundreds of drones and missiles – Europe live
summary: Poland dispatched aircraft to safeguard its airspace amid heightened tensions. The response came after Ukraine reported a significant Russian assault involving over 600 drones and missiles. This development underscores the escalating conflict and concerns for regional security.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Thiam out of heptathlon, men’s 800m final and more – live
summary: Luke McLaughlin provides updates from Tokyo on night eight of the event, featuring the decathlon and heptathlon competitions. Additionally, the relays are set to take place, adding to the excitement. Tune in for the latest results and highlights.

title: Rachel Reeves due to appear at gambling lobbyist’s event amid tax review
summary: The Chancellor's invitation has been met with criticism for its "strange timing," as it comes while the Treasury is considering raising duties on the £12 billion sector. This has raised concerns about the appropriateness of the Chancellor's engagement amidst ongoing discussions about potential tax increases. Critics argue that such actions could undermine the sector's stability and growth.
